postData.contentHtml:
Here's a list of great books we recommend for liveaboards. Using these Amazon links helps support our site.

  • Cap'n Fatty Goodlander - Buy, Outfit, and Sail
  • Cap'n Fatty Goodlander - Creative Anchoring
  • Don Casey - This Old Boat
  • John Vigor - Twenty Small Sailboats to Take You Anywhere
  • Ken Neumeyer - Sailing the Farm
  • Lin Pardey - The Care and Feeding of the Sailing Crew
  • Mark Nicholas - The Essentials of Living Aboard a Boat
  • Nigel Calder - Boatowner's Mechanical and Electrical Manual
  • Tom Neale - All in the Same Boat
postData.title: Books
